page.title: 02PWLLHELI MARKET
page.content: Today we left school by car to visit the market and funfair.We had questions and clipboards.The girls felt embarassed when we first went to the stalls! There were a hundred stalls and this is what we found out about 35 of them. {TYPE OF STALL}(number of stalls in brackets) {CLOTHES(5),ELECTRICAL(3),JEWELLERY(3), {MATERIALS(2),CRAFTS(2),FRUIT(2), {TOYS(2),LEATHER(2),TOOLS(2),GIFTS, {SEATCOVERS,WINDOWS,CARPETS,FLOWERS, {UNDERWEAR,LAMPSHADES,CUSHIONS,HATS, {BABYWEAR,NECKTIES,PWLLHELI ROCK. RENTS - They ranged from Â£65 to Â£10 for the day. LANGUAGE-19 of the 35 understood Welsh OTHER MARKETS_most stallholders visited other markets regularly:16 of these were in Wales and 7 markets in England.
